property.name: Parent
property.description: Type: "Stack", Parent stack for resolving names

property.name: Name
property.description: Type: "C", Name of element that this stack member is bound to.

methodref.name: GetCursor
methodref.description: Returns the name of a cursor for an element.

methodref.name: GetElement
methodref.description: Get a style element pointer from the stack.

methodref.name: QuickdrawGenerate
methodref.description: Given a style, generate quickdraw for font, color, brush and line style (the caller must generate the appropriate quickdraw for the border shape).

methodref.name: Clone
methodref.description: Create a copy of an object instance.

methodref.name: NewInstance
methodref.description: Create a new object instance of the same type.

page.original:
VisualStyle::Stack Class Properties Property Type Description Parent Stack Parent stack for resolving names Style Style Stylesheet for resolving names Name C Name of element that this stack member is bound to.
Methods Method Description PUBLIC Clone AS P ()Create a copy of an object instance. PUBLIC GetCursor AS c (fullName AS C)Returns the name of a cursor for an element. PUBLIC GetElement AS VisualStyle::Element (name AS C)Get a style element pointer from the stack. PUBLIC NewInstance AS P ()Create a new object instance of the same type. PUBLIC Output AS c (styleSheetOutputFormat AS C)Dump styles from all context. PUBLIC QuickdrawGenerate AS c (fullName [ AS C ,C flags [ AS ,N hdc = 0]] AS )Given a style, generate quickdraw for font, color, brush and line style (the caller must generate the appropriate quickdraw for the border shape).
See Also VisualStyle Namespace
